summary: Iteration 18: Tested new bottom navigation (Home, Education, NEWS bulge, Benefits, Helpline), Dump Yard card navigation (/dumpyard), Helpline page with emergency numbers, and Family API course_summary field. All features working correctly.

critical_code_review_comments: Layout.jsx: Bottom nav correctly updated with 5 items - Home, Education, NEWS (bulge), Benefits, Helpline
Layout.jsx: NEWS button has -mt-6 class for raised/bulge effect and gradient from-red-500 to-orange-500
Dashboard.jsx: Dump Yard card correctly links to /dumpyard (was /dump-yard before fix)
Helpline.jsx: New page with emergency numbers (Police 100, Ambulance 108, Fire 101, Women 181, Child 1098, Disaster 1078)
Helpline.jsx: Includes WhatsApp support card with external link
family.py: /members endpoint returns course_summary with total_courses, completed, in_progress, certificates
MyFamily.jsx: Course progress section renders when member has courses (total_courses > 0)
seed_data_creation: No new seed data. Test user has no family members, so course_summary display was verified via code review and API test.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Bottom nav now has 5 items: Home, Education, NEWS (center bulge with gradient), Benefits, Helpline. Dump Yard card links to /dumpyard. Helpline is a new public page with emergency numbers. Family API returns course_summary for each member (tested via pytest). Test user 9876543210 has no family members to verify UI course progress display, but backend and code structure verified.

bottom_navigation.news_bulge: WORKING - href=/news with gradient from-red-500 to-orange-500 and -mt-6 for raised effect

dump_yard_navigation.page_content: WORKING - Shows 350 acres, 1200 tons/day, pollution zones

family_course_summary.api_response: WORKING - Returns course_summary with total_courses, completed, in_progress, certificates
family_course_summary.ui_display: WORKING (code verified) - Shows course progress when member has courses
